name: StellarVania
description:
Meteor Presents

Are you man enough to beat our game?

Play as 3 unique characters in a single player platformer metroidvania with multiple characters to be controlled at your fingertips. Can you handle the power?

Story:

It is the future. Humanity has spread out to the stars and magic and technology are one in the same. In this vast new frontier, new kingdoms and empires are established. One of these kingdoms has been at peace for generations, but everything changed when the Goblin-Alien Collective attacked. Lead by the evil tech sorcerer, Jathar, this threat could be the end of the kingdom!

You are a hero of the kingdom-courageous and strong, and when this threat arises, you are the first to take up arms in defense. But the forces of the enemy are stronger than you initially anticipated. You find yourself captured and brought to the Gobin-Alien Collective's dread fortress, located in a treacherous asteroid belt. But you are ever persistent, and your only goal now is simple. Escape, for the kingdom counts on you!

Features:

  1. 3 playable character classes with distinct looks to them
  2. Different items and spells for your character that give them more options for attack
  3. Different enemy types
  4. Unique Level Design
